meanings.definition: The quality or state of being insoluble.
meanings.sent1: The insolubleness of the substance puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The insolubleness of the issue led to further research.
meanings.sent3: The insolubleness of the puzzle made everyone scratch their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of insolubleness, impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The insolubleness of the mystery hung in the air, thick and heavy.

meanings.definition: The inability to be solved or explained.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was frustrated by the insolubleness of the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The insolubleness of the riddle kept the children guessing for hours.
meanings.sent3: The insolubleness of the situation made him chuckle at its complexity.
meanings.sent4: The insolubleness of the question was like a locked door, blocking all answers.
meanings.sent5: The insolubleness of the enigma lingered in their minds, unsolved and mysterious.
